instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Album 4 of Hossein Forouhar包含的帖子的创建日期、内容、使用的浏览器、IP地址以及论坛的id，最多返回18条记录
output:
MATCH (a:Album {name: 'Hossein Forouhar'})-[:ALBUM_POST]->(p:Post {album_number: 4})
MATCH (p)-[:POST_USER]->(u:User),
     (u)-[:USER_BROWSER]->(b:Browser),
     (u)-[:USER_IP]->(i:IP),
     (p)-[:POST_FORUM]->(f:Forum)
RETURN p.id AS forum_id, p.created_date AS created_date, p.content AS content, b.name AS browser, i.address AS ip_address
LIMIT 18

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Album 5 of Hossein Forouhar包含的帖子的关联时间、帖子的创建时间、论坛的创建时间、帖子的位置IP、帖子使用的浏览器以及论坛的id
output:
MATCH (a:Album {id: '5'})-[:CONTAINS]->(p:Post)
WITH p
p, 
p.created_at AS post_created_at,
p.location.ip AS post_location_ip,
p.browser AS post_browser,
(pf:Forum {id: p.forum_id}) {id: pf.id, created_at: pf.created_at} AS forum
RETURN
p.id AS post_id,
p.created_at AS post_created_at,
p.location.ip AS post_location_ip,
p.browser AS post_browser,
forum.id AS forum_id,
forum.created_at AS forum_created_at

instruction:

RETURN f.id AS forum_id, f.creation_date AS forum_creation_date,
       p.email AS email, p.language AS language, p.birthday AS birthday,

OPTIONAL MATCH (m)-[r:Participates_in]->(f:Forum)
OPTIONAL MATCH (m)-[cr:Created]->(m:Member)

查找与Miles_Davis标签相关的论坛的信息，包括关系的创建日期、论坛的id、标签的id以及论坛的创建日期，跳过前14条记录，返回接下来的19条记录
output:
MATCH (f:Forum)-[r:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag {name: 'Miles_Davis'})
RETURN f.id AS forum_id, t.id AS tag_id, r.created_at AS relation_created_at, f.created_at AS forum_created_at
SKIP 14
LIMIT 19

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Album 19 of Hossein Forouhar的id、它具有的标签名称、关系的创建日期、论坛的创建日期和标题
output:
MATCH (a:Album {name: '19 of Hossein Forouhar'})-[:HAS_LABEL]->(l:Label),
      (a)-[:CREATED_ON]->(f:Forum)
RETURN a.id, l.name, a.created_date, f.created_date, f.name

instruction:

output:
// 假设的节点和关系结构
MATCH (a:Album {name: '22 of Hossein Forouhar'})-[:HAS_RELATIONSHIP {name: 'Walter_Scott'}]->(r:Relationship),
      (f:Forum {name: '论坛名称'}), 
      (l:Label {name: '标签名称'})
RETURN r.created_date, f.created_date, l.url, l.name

instruction:

LIMIT 7

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找与标签Charlton_Heston相关的论坛，返回关系的创建日期、论坛的标题和创建日期、标签的URL和名称，以及它们的id

MATCH (f:Forum)-[r:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag)
WHERE t.name = 'Charlton_Heston'
RETURN r.created_date AS relation_created_date,
       f.title AS forum_title,
       f.created_date AS forum_created_date,
       t.url AS tag_url,
       t.name AS tag_name,
       f.id AS forum_id,
       t.id AS tag_id

instruction:

RETURN t.name AS TagName, p.id AS ForumPostId, t.url AS TagUrl, p.created_date AS CreatedDate

instruction:

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:

RETURN t.id AS tag_id, f.title AS forum_title, t.url AS tag_url, f.created_date AS forum_created_date

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Wall of Wojciech Ciesla中包含Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo标签的关系的创建日期，以及该标签的id、名称和论坛的创建日期，并按标签名称排序

OPTIONAL MATCH (f:Forum {name: 'Wall of Wojciech Ciesla'})<-[:POSTED_IN]-(p)
RETURN p.created_date AS post_creation_date, t.id AS tag_id, t.name AS tag_name, f.created_date AS forum_creation_date
ORDER BY t.name

instruction:

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:

instruction:

OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:CREATED]->(post:Post)
RETURN p.birthday, p.gender, p.email, p.language,

       COLLECT(DISTINCT post.ip_address) AS post_ip_addresses

instruction:

instruction:

p.creationDate

instruction:

    post.image_file AS post_image_file,

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找与F. Scott Fitzgerald相关的帖子的创建日期、语言、标签名称、图片文件、内容、IP地址、帖子ID、使用的浏览器、标签ID、关系的创建日期和帖子长度，并按标签名称降序排列
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[r:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag)
WHERE p.title =~ 'F. Scott Fitzgerald' OR p.content =~ 'F. Scott Fitzgerald'
RETURN p.created_date, p.language, t.name AS tag_name, p.image_file, p.content, p.ip_address, p.id AS post_id, p.browser, r.created_date AS relation_created_date, size(p.content) AS post_length
ORDER BY t.name DESC

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找包含标签Denny_Hulme的帖子的信息，包括帖子的图片文件、关系的创建日期、帖子的创建日期、标签的URL、标签的id、标签的名称、帖子的id、帖子的内容、帖子的长度和帖子的位置IP。
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[r:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag {name: 'Denny_Hulme'})
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[ri:HAS_IMAGE]->(i:Image)
RETURN p.id AS post_id,
       p.content AS post_content,
       SIZE(r.timestamp) AS relation_creation_date,
       SIZE(p.timestamp) AS post_creation_date,
       t.url AS tag_url,
       t.id AS tag_id,
       t.name AS tag_name,
       i.file_path AS image_file_path,  // 假设图片文件有一个file_path属性
       LENGTH(p.content) AS post_length,
       p.ip_address AS post_location_ip

instruction:

MATCH (p:Post)-[:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag {name: 'Gulzar'}),
      (p)-[:HAS_IMAGE]->(i:ImageFile),
      (p)-[:USING_BROWSER]->(b:Browser),
      (p)-[:HAS_CREATED_ON]->(c:CreatedOn),
      (p)-[:HAS_LOCATION_IP]->(l:LocationIP),
      (t)-[:HAS_TAG_URL]->(u:TagURL),
      (p)-[:HAS_CONTENT]->(c2:PostContent),
      (p)-[:HAS_LENGTH]->(l2:PostLength)
RETURN i.name AS ImageFile,
       t.name AS TagName,
       b.name AS BrowserName,
       p.id AS PostID,
       c.date AS CreatedOnDate,
       l.ip AS LocationIP,
       u.url AS TagURL,
       c2.content AS PostContent,
       l2.length AS PostLength,
       t.id AS TagID
ORDER BY t.name DESC

查找对Henry_James感兴趣的人员的创建日期、id、姓氏、标签的URL、兴趣关系的创建日期、标签的id、名称、使用的浏览器、名字、性别、生日、语言和邮箱

WHERE p.properties('name') = 'Henry_James'
WITH p, p, p.properties('firstName') AS firstName, t.properties('url') AS tagUrl, t.properties('name') AS tagName, p.properties('date') AS interestDate, p.properties('id') AS interestId

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Wojciech的人及其认识的人的相关信息，包括他们的浏览器使用情况、生日、性别、创建日期、电子邮件、语言、位置IP以及关系的创建日期，限制返回10条结果。返回的信息包括：Wojciech的浏览器使用情况、生日、性别、创建日期、电子邮件、语言、位置IP、ID；他认识的人的浏览器使用情况、生日、性别、创建日期、位置IP、姓名、姓氏、ID。
output:
MATCH (w:Person {name: 'Wojciech'})-[:knows]->(p:Person)
OPTIONAL MATCH (w)-[r1:has_browser]->(b:Browser),
         (w)-[r2:has_birthday]->(bd:Date),
         (w)-[r3:has_gender]->(g:Gender),
         (w)-[r4:has_created]->(cd:Date),
         (w)-[r5:has_email]->(e:Email),
         (w)-[r6:has_language]->(l:Language),
         (w)-[r7:has_ip]->(ip:IP)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r8:has_browser]->(pb:Browser),
         (p)-[r9:has_birthday]->(pdb:Date),
         (p)-[r10:has_gender]->(pg:Gender),
         (p)-[r11:has_created]->(pcd:Date),
         (p)-[r12:has_ip]->(pip:IP)
RETURN
    w.browser_usage AS w_browser_usage,
    w.birthday AS w_birthday,
    w.gender AS w_gender,
    w.created AS w_created,
    w.email AS w_email,
    w.language AS w_language,
    w.ip AS w_ip,
    w.id AS w_id,
    p.browser_usage AS p_browser_usage,
    p.birthday AS s_birthday,
    p.gender AS s_gender,
    p.created AS s_created,
    p.ip AS s_ip,
    p.name AS s_name,
    p.surname AS s_surname,
    p.id AS s_id
LIMIT 11

UNION

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
跳过前9个，查找属于TennisPlayer类别的标签的名称，类别URL，类别名称和类别ID，限制返回10条结果
output:
MATCH (l:Label)-[:BELONGS_TO]->(c:Category)
WHERE c.name = 'TennisPlayer'
RETURN l.name, c.url, c.name AS category_name, c.id
SKIP 9
LIMIT 11

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Pablo_Cuevas的标签及其所属的TennisPlayer类别，返回Pablo_Cuevas的名称和id，以及TennisPlayer类别的id、名称和url，限制返回20条结果
output:
MATCH (l:Label {name: 'Pablo_Cuevas'})-[:HAS_CATEGORY {category_id: 'TennisPlayer'}]->(c:Category)
RETURN l.name AS label_name, l.id AS label_id, c.id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, c.url AS category_url
LIMIT 20

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找TennisPlayer类型标签的名称、id、URL以及其子标签的名称、id和URL
output:
MATCH (player:TennisPlayer)-[:HAS_SUB_LABEL]->(subLabel)
RETURN player.name AS tennisPlayerName, player.id AS tennisPlayerId, player.url AS tennisPlayerUrl,
       sub.name AS subName, sub.id AS subId, sub.url AS subUrl

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Guillermo Coria的标签属于的TennisPlayer类别的URL
output:
MATCH (t:Tag {name: 'Guillermo Coria'})-[:TAGGED_AS]->(p:TennisPlayer {url: 'your_url'})
RETURN p.url

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Carlos_Tévez的标签及其类型为SoccerPlayer的标签类的信息，返回Carlos_Tévez的URL和id，以及SoccerPlayer的名称、URL和id。
output:
MATCH (c:Carlos_Tévez {name: 'Carlos_Tévez'})-[:IS_A]->(s:SoccerPlayer)
RETURN c.id AS Carlos_Tévez_id, c.url AS Carlos_Tévez_url,
       s.name AS SoccerPlayer_name, s.id AS SoccerPlayer_id, s.url AS SoccerPlayer_url

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找属于TennisPlayer类别的标签名称及其对应的类别URL和类别ID
output:
MATCH (l:Label)-[r:HAS_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
WHERE c.name = 'TennisPlayer'
RETURN l.name AS labelName, c.url AS categoryUrl, c.id AS categoryId

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Florencia Labat的标签信息的id、名称和URL，以及其所属的TennisPlayer类别信息的名称和URL
output:
MATCH (l:Label {name: 'Florencia Labat'}) 
OPTIONAL MATCH (l)-[r:HAS_TAG]->(t:TennisPlayer)
RETURN l.id AS label_id, l.name AS label_name, l.url AS label_url,
       t.name AS tennis_player_name, t.url AS tennis_player_url

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Person的所有子类的名称
output:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:IS_SUBCLASS_OF]->(c)
RETURN c.name

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为BritishRoyalty的标签类属于名为Royalty的标签类的信息，返回Royalty的url、id、名称以及BritishRoyalty的id和url，限制返回结果为2条。
output:
MATCH (r:Royalty)-[rel]->(br:BritishRoyalty)
RETURN r.url, r.id, r.name, br.id, br.url
LIMIT 2

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Person类下的子类信息，包括子类的URL、父类名称、子类ID、子类名称和父类URL，限制返回13条记录
output:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:subClassOf]->(c:Class)
RETURN c.url AS 子类URL, p.name AS 父类名称, c.id AS 子类ID, c.name AS 子类名称, p.url AS 父类URL
LIMIT 13

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为PrimeMinister的标签类属于哪个名为Politician的父类标签，返回父类标签的名称，最多返回3个结果
output:
MATCH (p:PrimeMinister)-[:isa]->(parent:Politician)
RETURN parent.name
LIMIT 3

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Cricketer类别的父类别Athlete的url、名称、Cricketer的id、Athlete的id以及Cricketer的url，并按Athlete的名称降序排列
output:
MATCH (a:Athlete)-[:IS_A]->(c:Cricketer)
RETURN a.url AS athleteUrl, a.name AS athleteName, c.id AS cricketerId, a.id AS athleteId, c.url AS cricketerUrl
ORDER BY a.name DESC

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Athlete类别下的GolfPlayer子类别的URL、名称以及GolfPlayer的id和名称
output:
MATCH (c:Category {name: 'Athlete'})-[:IS_SUBCATEGORY_OF]->(sc:SubCategory {name: 'GolfPlayer'})
RETURN sc.id AS SubCategoryID, sc.name AS SubCategoryName, sc.url AS SubCategoryURL

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Cyclist所属的标签类别的id
output:
MATCH (c:Cyclist)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(cat:Category)
RETURN cat.id

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找MilitaryPerson类别的id和名称，以及它的父类别Person的url和名称
output:
MATCH (militaryPerson:MilitaryPerson)-[:subClassOf]->(person:Person)
RETURN militaryPerson.id, militaryPerson.name, person.url, person.name

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Architect的标签类的父类信息的id和名称，并按父类名称排序
output:
MATCH (l:Label {name: 'Architect'})-[:IS_SUBCLASS_OF]->(p:Label)
RETURN p.id AS parentId, p.name AS parentName
ORDER BY p.name ASC

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Politician的所有子类的id、URL以及它们自身的id、URL和名称
output:
MATCH (p:Politician)-[:IS_A]->(c)
OPTIONAL MATCH (c)<-[:IS_A]-(parent:Politician)
RETURN p.id AS PoliticianId, p.url AS PoliticianUrl, p.name AS PoliticianName,
       c.id AS ChildId, c.url AS ChildUrl, c.name AS ChildName,
       parent.id AS ParentId, parent.url AS ParentUrl, parent.name AS ParentName

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找ChristianBishop所属的Cleric类别的URL
output:
MATCH (c:Cleric {name: 'ChristianBishop'})-[:HAS_URL]->(u:URL)
RETURN u.url

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Athlete的子类标签类别的id和名称，以及父类的id
output:
MATCH (a:*)-[:IS_A*0]->(p:Athlete)
RETURN p.id AS parent_id, a.id AS child_id, a.name AS child_name
ORDER BY a.name

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Athlete这个标签类的子类的url和id
output:
MATCH (a:Athlete)-[:IS_SUBCLASS_OF]->(sub:*)
RETURN sub.id, sub.url

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找类别为Person的子类别Model的id，同时返回Person的id
output:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:HAS_MODEL]->(m:Model)
RETURN p.id, m.id

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Person类下的FictionalCharacter类的名称
output:
MATCH (p:Person {type: 'FictionalCharacter'})
RETURN p.name
